alert.note: Alert for North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 10:55PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Elbert, southern Washington and northeastern Lincoln Counties through 1145 PM MDT... At 1053 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty outflow winds from strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles north of Genoa to 5 miles north of Arriba to 9 miles south of Flagler, or along a line extending from 18 miles northeast of Limon to 14 miles southwest of Seibert. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Limon, Hugo, Arriba, Genoa, Thurman, Arickaree School, Anton, Woodlin School, Lindon and Last Chance. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. The strong winds will occur well ahead of the arrival of the rain. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County; Washington County
